name: Economic Surge
title: Rapid Economic Growth
description: In 2022, Gabon experienced a remarkable economic surge with a GNI growth rate of 14.79%, one of the highest in the world.

name: Health Challenge
title: High HIV Prevalence Among Women
description: In 2022, 71.2% of the population aged 15 and above living with HIV in Gabon were women, highlighting a significant public health challenge.
